result.html: Lig dom imeachtLet me leave!
result.ponchtml: Lig dom imeaċtLet me leave!

result.eng: She made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.
result.ga: Lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailte
result.orig: Lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailte
result.html: Lig sí osna faoisimh nuair a chonaic sí an doras oscailteShe made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.
result.ponchtml: Lig sí osna faoisiṁ nuair a ċonaic sí an doras oscailteShe made a sigh of relief when she saw the open door.

result.eng: She let out a loud scream of laughter.
result.ga: Lig sí liú ard gáire aisti
result.orig: Lig sí liú ard gáire aisti
result.html: Lig sí liú ard gáire aistiShe let out a loud scream of laughter.
result.ponchtml: Lig sí liú ard gáire aistiShe let out a loud scream of laughter.

result.eng: She wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ga: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.orig: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.html: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaighShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ponchtml: Níor ligeaḋ di a cuid a iṫe i gcuideaċta an teaġlaiġShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.

result.eng: He was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ga: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.orig: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.html: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé eadar ḋá ċóṁairle cé acu a ḃéarfaḋ sé leis an príosúnaċ nó a ligfeaḋ sé a ċeann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.

result.eng: For the life of you, don't let it get away from you!
result.ga: Ar do bhás ná lig uait é
result.orig: Ar do bhás ná lig uait é
result.html: Ar do bhás ná lig uait éFor the life of you, don't let it get away from you!
result.ponchtml: Ar do ḃás ná lig uait éFor the life of you, don't let it get away from you!

result.eng: Fear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.
result.ga: Ní ligfeadh an eagla do Shéimí cur suas don obair
result.orig: Ní ligfeadh an eagla do Shéimí cur suas don obair
result.html: Ní ligfeadh an eagla do Shéimí cur suas don obairFear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.
result.ponchtml: Ní ligfeaḋ an eagla do Ṡéimí cur suas don obairFear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.
